resources.string: Permission is required for app to run.
Please enable permission in setting, which will open next.
Permission to access the camera is required for this app to run.
Please enable the camera permission under the Permissions heading in the next screen.
Android requires that this app have Location permission to communicate over Bluetooth Low Energy.
Location permission is required so that this app can communicate to Bluetooth Low Energy Devices.
Please enable location permission under the Permissions heading in the next screen.
